info.name: MagicServer API Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for testing MagicServer endpoints. Demo data is seeded for Florida (stateId=12) and year=2024.

item.name: Geo API - Geographic Data
GUI-1: Get All States (GeoJSON FeatureCollection)

request.description:
Returns a GeoJSON FeatureCollection containing all 48 mainland states. Each feature includes:
- type: 'Feature'
- properties: State properties (GEO_ID, STATE, NAME, etc.)
- geometry: State boundary coordinates

Use this for rendering the US map on the splash page.

item.name: GUI-20: Get Specific State (GeoJSON FeatureCollection)

request.description:
Returns a GeoJSON FeatureCollection with a single state feature. Includes:
- type: 'FeatureCollection'
- features: Array with one Feature containing properties and geometry

Use this for displaying a specific state boundary on the state detail page.

item.name: GUI-2: Get Counties for State (GeoJSON FeatureCollection)

request.description:
Returns a GeoJSON FeatureCollection of county boundaries for detailed states. Each feature includes:
- type: 'Feature'
- properties: County properties (GEO_ID, STATE, COUNTY, NAME, LSAD, CENSUSAREA)
- geometry: County boundary coordinates

Use this to display EAVS geographic unit boundaries on state maps.

item.name: Get All State Centers

request.description:
Returns an array of state center data for all states. Each object includes:
- stateId: State identifier
- name: State name
- lon: Center longitude
- lat: Center latitude
- zoom: Recommended zoom level

Use this to get map view settings for centering on states.

item.name: Get State Center by ID

request.description:
Returns center coordinates and zoom level for a specific state:
- stateId: State identifier
- name: State name
- lon: Center longitude
- lat: Center latitude
- zoom: Recommended zoom level

Use this to center the map on a specific state at the correct zoom level.

item.name: Facts API - State Level
GUI-2: Political Party CVAP by State

request.description: Returns political party CVAP (Citizen Voting Age Population) percentages for detailed states.

item.name: GUI-3: Provisional Ballots by State

request.description: Returns provisional ballot data broken down by category (E2a-E2i) for displaying in a bar chart.

item.name: GUI-5: Active Voters by State

request.description: Returns active voter statistics for a state: total registered, active, and inactive voters.

item.name: GUI-6: Pollbook Deletions by State

request.description: Returns pollbook deletion statistics by category for a state.

item.name: GUI-7: Mail Ballot Rejections by State

request.description: Returns mail ballot rejection statistics by reason for a state.

item.name: GUI-9: Early Voting by State

request.description: Returns early voting statistics for a state across multiple years.

item.name: GUI-10: State Comparison

request.description: Returns comparison data for a state: voter turnout, rejection rates, etc.

item.name: GUI-6: Equipment Summary by State

request.description: Returns comprehensive equipment summary for a state from denormalized table. Includes: manufacturer, model_name, quantity, equipment_type, age, os, certification_level, scanning_rate, error_rate, reliability, quality, and short_description. Data matches 6_Equipment_Summary_by_State_with_short_description.csv.

item.name: GUI-16: Equipment History by State

request.description: Returns historical equipment data for a state across multiple years.

item.name: GUI-21 & GUI-22: Registration and Turnout Metrics by State

request.description:
Returns comprehensive voter registration and turnout data for a state. Combines data from registration_metrics_by_state and active_voters_by_state tables. Includes:
- totalVotesCast: Total votes cast in the election
- totalCvap: Citizen Voting Age Population
- registrationRate: Percentage of CVAP that is registered
- turnoutRate: Percentage voter turnout
- totalRegisteredVoters: Total number of registered voters
- activeRegisteredVoters: Number of active registered voters

Use this for GUI-21 and GUI-22 registration and turnout analysis.

item.name: EAVS Data Quality Score by State

request.description:
Returns the EAVS data quality score (from EAVS Missing Data Metric) for a specific state. The score ranges from 0.0 to 1.0, where higher values indicate better data quality. This metric is derived from the 2_EAVS_Missing_Data_Metric.csv dataset.

Response includes:
- stateId: State identifier (INTEGER)
- dataQualityScore: Quality score ranging from 0.0 to 1.0 (DOUBLE)

Use this to assess the reliability and completeness of EAVS data for a given state.

item.name: GUI-28: Equipment EI Curve by State

request.description:
Returns equipment quality ecological inference (EI) kernel density estimation (KDE) data for visualization. Shows the relationship between equipment quality scores and probability density across different demographic groups.

Response format:
{
  "stateId": 48,
  "demographicData": {
    "White": [
      { "equipmentQuality": 0.0, "probabilityDensity": 0.0 },
      { "equipmentQuality": 0.0101, "probabilityDensity": 0.0 },
      ...
    ],
    "Hispanic": [...],
    "African American": [...]
  }
}

Each demographic group contains an array of data points with:
- equipmentQuality: Quality score from 0.0 to 1.0
- probabilityDensity: Probability density value for KDE curve

Use this for GUI-28 EI KDE density visualization to analyze the relationship between equipment quality and demographic voting patterns.

item.name: GUI-29: Rejected Ballot EI Curve by State

request.description:
Returns rejected ballot ecological inference (EI) kernel density estimation (KDE) data for visualization. Shows the relationship between ballot rejection probability and probability density across different demographic groups.

Response format:
{
  "stateId": 48,
  "demographicData": {
    "White": [
      { "rejectionProbability": 0.0, "probabilityDensity": 0.0 },
      { "rejectionProbability": 0.0001, "probabilityDensity": 0.0 },
      ...
    ],
    "Hispanic": [...],
    "African American": [...]
  }
}

Each demographic group contains an array of data points with:
- rejectionProbability: Rejection probability from 0.0 to ~0.03
- probabilityDensity: Probability density value for KDE curve

Use this for GUI-29 EI KDE density visualization to analyze the relationship between ballot rejection rates and demographic patterns.

item.name: GUI-27: Precinct Demographic Regression by State

request.description:
Returns precinct-level demographic regression coefficients for Gingles analysis. These coefficients represent the quadratic regression relationship between demographic percentages and voting patterns.

Response format:
[
  {
    "state": "Texas",
    "party": "Democratic",
    "demographic": "White",
    "coef_a": 0.000345,
    "coef_b": -0.949716,
    "coef_c": 95.698004
  },
  {
    "state": "Texas",
    "party": "Republican",
    "demographic": "White",
    "coef_a": -0.00012,
    "coef_b": 0.927997,
    "coef_c": 3.257758
  },
  ...
]

Each entry contains:
- state: State name (Alabama or Texas)
- party: Political party (Democratic or Republican)
- demographic: Demographic group (White, Hispanic, African American)
- coef_a, coef_b, coef_c: Quadratic regression coefficients where y = a*x^2 + b*x + c

Use this for GUI-27 Gingles precinct analysis to model voting behavior based on demographic composition.

item.name: Facts API - Region Level
GUI-4: Provisional Ballots by Region

request.description: Returns provisional ballot data by EAVS region with breakdown by category.

item.name: GUI-5: Active Voters by Region

request.description: Returns active voter statistics broken down by EAVS region.

item.name: GUI-6: Pollbook Deletions by Region

request.description: Returns pollbook deletion statistics by EAVS region with category breakdown.

item.name: GUI-7: Mail Ballot Rejections by Region

request.description: Returns mail ballot rejection statistics by EAVS region with reason breakdown.

item.name: GUI-24: Dropbox Voting by Region (Bubble Chart)

request.description:
Returns dropbox voting metrics broken down by EAVS geographic unit for displaying in a bubble chart. Each data point includes:
- republicanVotes2024: Republican votes in the region
- democratVotes2024: Democrat votes in the region
- totalPresidentialVotes2024: Total presidential votes cast
- mailInBallots: Number of mail-in ballots
- totalBallots: Total ballots cast in the region
- percentRepublican: Percentage of Republican votes (X-axis for bubble chart)
- percentMailInBallots: Percentage of mail-in ballots (Y-axis for bubble chart)

Use this for GUI-24 bubble chart visualization showing relationship between political party and mail-in ballot usage.

item.name: GUI-14: Equipment Quality vs Rejection by Region

request.description: Returns equipment quality and ballot rejection correlation data by EAVS region.

item.name: GUI-10: Display Type of Voting Equipment by Region

request.description:
Returns the types of voting equipment used in each EAVS geographic unit (county/region) for displaying in a data table.

Response format:
[
  {
    "regionName": "County Name",
    "typeOfEquipmentUsed": ["Scanner", "Ballot Marking Device", "DRE with VVPAT"]
  },
  ...
]

Each region includes:
- regionName: Name of the county/region
- typeOfEquipmentUsed: Array of equipment type strings

Possible equipment types:
- Scanner
- Ballot Marking Device
- DRE with VVPAT
- DRE without VVPAT

Use this to identify what types of voting equipment are deployed in each region and regions that may need equipment upgrades or standardization.

item.name: GUI 17: Voter Registration Summary by Region

request.description:
Returns voter registration data with party breakdown and completeness metrics for each region in the state.

Response format:
[
  {
    "regionId": 454,
    "regionName": "Alachua County",
    "geoId": 12001,
    "totalNumRegisteredVoters": 202011,
    "totalNumRepublican": 55577,
    "totalNumDemocratic": 90250,
    "totalNumUnaffiliated": 50337,
    "totalCvap": 218105,
    "registeredVoterPercentage": 92.62,
    "completeness": 0.66,
    "contactCompleteness": 0.41
  },
  ...
]

Each region includes:
- regionId: EAVS region identifier (can be used with voter endpoints)
- regionName: County/region name
- geoId: County FIPS code
- totalNumRegisteredVoters: Total registered voters
- totalNumRepublican: Republican registered voters
- totalNumDemocratic: Democrat registered voters
- totalNumUnaffiliated: Unaffiliated/other registered voters
- totalCvap: Citizen Voting Age Population
- registeredVoterPercentage: (total_registered / total_cvap) * 100
- completeness: Data completeness metric (0.0-1.0)
- contactCompleteness: Contact info completeness (0.0-1.0)

Use this for:
- Analyzing voter registration patterns by party
- Assessing data quality and completeness
- Comparing registration rates to CVAP

item.name: GUI-5, GUI-7, GUI-8, GUI-9, GUI-10: County Choropleth Info

request.description:
Returns aggregated county-level data for choropleth map visualization. For each county (region) in the state, provides:
- regionId: The EAVS region identifier (INTEGER) - can be used to query voter lists
- countyName: Name of the county/region
- totalProvisional: Total provisional ballots from provisional_by_region table
- activeVoterPercentage: Calculated as (active_voter / (active_voter + inactive_voter)) * 100. Returns 0.0 if active_voters_by_region table is not seeded or has no record
- pollbookDeletionPercentage: Calculated as (sum of all deletion reasons / total_registered_user) * 100
- rejectionPercentage: Mail ballot rejection percentage from mail_ballot_rejection_by_region table
- typeOfEquipmentUsed: Array of equipment type strings (e.g., ['Scanner', 'DRE with VVPAT'])

This endpoint combines data from multiple region tables to provide comprehensive county metrics for map visualization.

The regionId can be used with voter endpoints:
- GET /api/voters/regions/{regionId} to get paginated voter lists for that county

item.name: Facts API - National Level
GUI-11: Average Equipment Age by State (Choropleth Map)

request.description:
Returns average age of voting equipment for all states for displaying on a choropleth map on the splash page. The choropleth bins show age from 1 year through 10 years, with an additional category for older than 10 years.

Response format:
[
  {
    "stateId": 1,
    "averageAgeOfEquipment": 12
  },
  {
    "stateId": 2,
    "averageAgeOfEquipment": 14
  },
  ...
]

Each entry contains:
- stateId: State identifier (INTEGER)
- averageAgeOfEquipment: Average age of equipment in years (INTEGER)

Colors should be in the same hue with saturation increasing with older devices. Use this for GUI-11 choropleth visualization to identify states with aging voting equipment that may need replacement.

item.name: GUI-12: Equipment Totals by State

request.description: Returns total equipment counts by state and year. Used for national equipment inventory view.

item.name: Equipment API
GUI-13: Equipment Overview (National)

request.description: Returns voting equipment overview for all states at the national level. Includes make, model, quantity, age, quality scores, and reliability metrics.

item.name: Facts API - Precinct Level
GUI-27: Gingles Chart Data by Precinct

request.description:
Returns Gingles chart data for all precincts in Texas (state_id=48). Each precinct has multiple rows (one per political party). Data includes:
- county: County name (fetched via JOIN with county table)
- countyFips: County FIPS code
- precinctName: Name of the precinct
- precinctId: Precinct identifier
- totalVotes: Total votes cast in the precinct
- whitePct: Percentage of white population
- hispanicPct: Percentage of Hispanic population
- africanAmericanPct: Percentage of African American population
- party: Political party (Democratic or Republican)
- votePercent: Vote percentage for the party
- votes: Number of votes for the party

This visualization helps identify racially polarized voting patterns as required for Voting Rights Act preclearance analysis.

item.name: Voter API - Individual Voter Records
Get Voters by Region ID (All Parties)

query.description: Page number (0-based). Each page returns 7 voters.
Optional party filter (Republican, Democrat, Other). Leave empty for all parties.

variable.description: Region ID (496 has 30 test voters in V23 seed)

request.description:
Returns 7 voters per page for the specified region (by region_id). Each page contains unique voters that haven't been seen in previous pages. Voters are sorted by ID to ensure consistent pagination.

Test data (V23__seed_voter_list.sql):
- region_id 496: 30 total voters
  - 6 Republicans
  - 8 Democrats
  - 16 Other

Pagination without filter:
- Page 0: Voters 1-7
- Page 1: Voters 8-14
- Page 2: Voters 15-21
- Page 3: Voters 22-28
- Page 4: Voters 29-30 (last page with only 2 voters)

Response includes:
- voters: List of up to 7 voters with id, regionId, regionName, nameFull, party
- currentPage: Current page number (0-based)
- totalPages: Total pages available (5 pages for 30 voters)
- totalElements: Total number of voters in the region (30)
- hasNext: true if more pages available
- hasPrevious: true if not on first page
- pageSize: Always 7

Use this when you already know the region_id from other queries.

item.name: Get Voters by Region ID (Republicans Only)

query.description: Page number (0-based). Each page returns 7 voters.

variable.description: Region ID (496 has 30 test voters in V23 seed)

request.description:
Returns 7 Republican voters per page for the specified region.

Test data (V23__seed_voter_list.sql):
- region_id 496: 6 Republican voters
  - Carlos Ulyses Largaespada
  - Judith Esther Reyes Higgins
  - Luz Guianbelly Dallas Contreras
  - Mayde Diaz Alvarez
  - Tiffany Hervis
  - Guianeya De Las Mercedes Diaz
  - Jina Hernandez

With party=Republican filter:
- Page 0: 6-7 Republican voters (depending on data)
- totalElements: 6-7 (only Republicans counted)
- totalPages: 1

Response includes only Republican voters in the voters array.

item.name: Get Voters by Region ID (Democrats Only)

query.description: Page number (0-based). Each page returns 7 voters.

variable.description: Region ID (496 has 30 test voters in V23 seed)

request.description:
Returns 7 Democrat voters per page for the specified region.

Test data (V23__seed_voter_list.sql):
- region_id 496: 8 Democrat voters
  - Maria Maddalena Castellaneta
  - Gloria Patricia Taylor
  - Ronaldo Loaisiga
  - Steven John Valentino
  - Tymesha O'Neka Jones
  - Kayla Pacheco
  - Gail Delores Wilson
  - James Harris
  - Franklin L Smith
  - Albanery Badia

With party=Democrat filter:
- Page 0: 7 Democrat voters
- Page 1: Remaining Democrat voters (if more than 7)
- totalElements: 8-10 (only Democrats counted)
- totalPages: 2

Response includes only Democrat voters in the voters array.

item.name: Get Voters by Region ID (Other Parties)

query.description: Page number (0-based). Each page returns 7 voters.

variable.description: Region ID (496 has 30 test voters in V23 seed)

request.description:
Returns 7 voters from other parties (not Republican or Democrat) per page.

Test data (V23__seed_voter_list.sql):
- region_id 496: 16 Other voters

With party=Other filter:
- Page 0: 7 Other voters
- Page 1: 7 Other voters
- Page 2: 2 Other voters
- totalElements: 16 (only Other counted)
- totalPages: 3

Response includes only voters with party='Other' in the voters array.

item.name: Get Voters by Region Name (All Parties)

query.description: Page number (0-based). Each page returns 7 voters.
Optional party filter (Republican, Democrat, Other). Leave empty for all parties.

variable.description: Region (county) name - must match name in eavs_region table

request.description:
Returns 7 voters per page for the specified region (by region name). The service looks up the region_id from the eavs_region table using the region name, then returns paginated voters.

Each page contains unique voters that haven't been seen in previous pages. Voters are sorted by ID to ensure consistent pagination.

Note: The region name must exactly match the name in the eavs_region table (case-sensitive). For the test data in V23__seed_voter_list.sql (region_id 496), you'll need to query the eavs_region table to find the corresponding region name.

Response includes:
- voters: List of up to 7 voters with id, regionId, regionName, nameFull, party
- currentPage: Current page number (0-based)
- totalPages: Total pages available
- totalElements: Total number of voters in the region
- hasNext: true if more pages available
- hasPrevious: true if not on first page
- pageSize: Always 7

Returns 404 if region name not found in eavs_region table.

Use this when you know the region/county name but not the region_id.

item.name: Get Voters by Region Name (Republicans Only)

query.description: Page number (0-based). Each page returns 7 voters.

variable.description: Region (county) name - must match name in eavs_region table

request.description:
Returns 7 Republican voters per page for the specified region (by region name).

Filters results to only include voters with party='Republican'.

The service looks up the region_id from the eavs_region table using the region name, then returns paginated Republican voters only.

Response includes:
- voters: List of up to 7 Republican voters only
- totalElements: Total number of Republican voters in the region
- totalPages: Total pages for Republican voters (based on count/7)

Returns 404 if region name not found in eavs_region table.

item.name: Get Voters by Region Name (Democrats Only)

query.description: Page number (0-based). Each page returns 7 voters.

variable.description: Region (county) name - must match name in eavs_region table

request.description:
Returns 7 Democrat voters per page for the specified region (by region name).

Filters results to only include voters with party='Democrat'.

The service looks up the region_id from the eavs_region table using the region name, then returns paginated Democrat voters only.

Response includes:
- voters: List of up to 7 Democrat voters only
- totalElements: Total number of Democrat voters in the region
- totalPages: Total pages for Democrat voters (based on count/7)

Returns 404 if region name not found in eavs_region table.
